title: “Heritage Site” means the area within the boundary / extent of the heritage building / Precinct / natural area included in the heritage list and as shown on the map
clause_text: “Heritage Site” means the area within the boundary / extent of the heritage building / Precinct / natural area included in the heritage list and as shown on the map.
